section_2.heading: List your car
section_2.contents: Share your pickup, sports car or anything in between which is non-commercial. Listing take 10 minutes and is free. No registration fees, no monthly tees.

section_2.heading: Set your price & rules
section_2.contents: Lay your own ground rules and customise when your car is available. Set your own daily price or let Carchaze automatically adjust your price to maximise earnings.

section_2.heading: Welcome your guests
section_2.contents: When a guest books your car, you'll confirm where and how to hand over the keys before the trip. Check your guest in with Carchaze app then sit back and relax until the trip is over.

section_2.heading: Sit back & earn
section_2.contents: Get paid via direct deposit within three days after each trip. You'll earn 65% - 75% of the trip price unless you opt to not choose any protection plan. You'll also get reimbursed for fuel and any mileage beyond your limit.

section_4.heading: More bang for your budget
section_4.contents: Wide range of cars, Complete with a better, more convenient experience. Find a perfect for your budget, starting from Rs. 2000 per day.

section_4.heading: Free cancellation
section_4.contents: Cancel for full refund up to 24 hours before your trip starts. Because life happens and it help to be flexible when it does.
